attributes.action: take action against the injustices and human rights violations youth activists in Azerbaijan have been faced with.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We urge the British Parliament to take action against the injustices and human rights violations youth activists and journalists in Azerbaijan have been faced with.  We condemn the unjustified detainment of Emin Milli and Adnan Hajizada and all other journalists unfairly and unlawfully detained in an attempt to silence the opposition.
attributes.creator_name: Miss Leyla Najafova and Miss Gulsum Asadova
